text: Chisai go chi wa betsu to shite, taizai ya harenchina koi o yokeru mono ni wa,-nushi no yosha wa hontoni kodaidearu. Kare wa daichi kara tsukuridasa reta toki no anata gata ni tsuite, mata, anata gataga haha no tainai ni hisonde ita toki no anata gata ni tsuite, mottomo yoku shitte ora reru. Dakara, anata gata wa jibun de seijo butte wa naranai. Kare wa omo o osoreru mono o mottomo yoku shitte ora reru
